definition.de: Jede Variation der Behandlung wie Stresstests, Katheterisieren, Bluttests, CT oder MCR.
definition.dk: Medicinske analyseprocedurer såsom blodprøver, stresstest, røntgenstråler, MR-scanning og mere.
definition.en-GB: Any of a variety of treatments such as stress tests,  catheterisation, blood tests, computerised axial tomography scan or magnetic resonance  imaging
definition.en-US: Any of a variety of treatments such as stress tests, catheterization, blood tests, computerized axial tomography scan or magnetic resonance imaging
definition.pt-BR: Variedade de tratamentos, como testes de estresse, cateterização, exames de sangue, tomografia computadorizada, ressonância magnética etc.
definition.pt-PT: Variedade de tratamentos, como testes de stress, cateterização, análises ao sangue, tomografia axial computadorizada, ressonância magnética, etc.
definition.se: Medicinska analysprocedurer såsom blodprov, stresstester, skiktröntgen, magnetisk resonanstomografi med mera.
definition.zh-Hans: 任何一种治疗方法，如压力测试、导管插入术、血液检测、计算机轴向断层扫描(CT)和磁共振成像等

prefLabel.pt-PT: meios complementares de diagnóstico e terapêutica
